title: New computer
body:
Hey guys after posting the last computer i was planning on buying and finding out its not very good (i dont know too much about them) i upped the price to pick a different one and wanted opinions before i made the decision to buy it these are the specs
AsRock Fatal1ty 990fx Motherboard
GeForce GTX 960
8GB Ram
AMD FX 8 Core Processor
1TB Hard Disk
HP DVD writer-rom
Any chance someone would know what settings/fps it could run league on? And also fortnight? Thanks!
